name: Finisher
description: Survive to the end of 3 Classic Mode matches with less than 5 health remaining while at Gold tier or higher.

rewards.title: Finisher
rewards.extra: Exclusive title and achievement points upon completion.

tipsTricks.heading: Control Your Health in the Final Circle
tipsTricks.description: Use a Molotov or stand in the play zone to reduce your health to less than 5 just before securing the final kill.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Low-Population Zones
tipsTricks.description: Start in remote areas to avoid early confrontations and improve your chances of surviving to the final circle.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Defensively
tipsTricks.description: Avoid unnecessary fights and use stealth to outlast other players. Stay within safe zones and position yourself strategically.

tipsTricks.heading: Carry Healing Supplies
tipsTricks.description: Bring plenty of bandages, medkits, and boosters to maintain health while ensuring you can lower it intentionally at the right time.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Solo Mode
tipsTricks.description: Attempt this mission in Solo Mode for better control over the final circle and the last opponent.

tipsTricks.heading: Check Your Tier
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you are in Gold tier or higher in Classic Mode before attempting this mission.

requirements.heading: Gold Tier or Higher
requirements.description: You must be at least in Gold tier in Classic Mode to qualify for this mission.

requirements.heading: Win with Less than 5 Health
requirements.description: Survive to the end of the match with your health bar below 5 HP.

requirements.heading: Survive 3 Matches
requirements.description: Complete this requirement in 3 separate Classic Mode matches.

name: Veteran
description: Complete any 4 of the following weapon-specific mystery missions: SMG Mystery, Sniper Mystery, Shotgun Mystery, Melee Mystery, Assault Mystery, or Pistol Mystery.

rewards.title: Veteran
rewards.extra: Achievement points and a prestigious in-game title.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on One Mission at a Time
tipsTricks.description: Choose one weapon category per match to streamline progress towards completing its specific mystery.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the Right Map
tipsTricks.description: Select maps with the highest likelihood of finding the required weapons (e.g., Miramar for snipers, Sanhok for shotguns).

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in Close-Range Combat for Melee and Shotguns
tipsTricks.description: Land in areas with high player density to maximize melee and shotgun opportunities in close-range fights.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Lower Tiers
tipsTricks.description: Playing in lower-ranked lobbies increases the chances of encountering bots, making it easier to complete weapon-specific challenges.

tipsTricks.heading: Track Your Progress
tipsTricks.description: Keep an eye on your mission progress after each match to determine which mysteries are close to completion.

requirements.heading: Complete SMG Mystery
requirements.description: Eliminate enemies using Sub-Machine Guns like UMP45, Vector, or Micro Uzi.

requirements.heading: Complete Sniper Mystery
requirements.description: Achieve kills using sniper rifles such as Kar98k, M24, or AWM.

requirements.heading: Complete Shotgun Mystery
requirements.description: Secure eliminations with shotguns like S686, S1897, or S12K.

requirements.heading: Complete Melee Mystery
requirements.description: Take down enemies with melee weapons such as Pan, Crowbar, or Sickle.

requirements.heading: Complete Assault Mystery
requirements.description: Finish enemies using assault rifles like M416, AKM, or SCAR-L.

requirements.heading: Complete Pistol Mystery
requirements.description: Eliminate enemies with pistols such as P1911, R1895, or Desert Eagle.

name: Predator V
description: Eliminate 20 enemies in a single Classic Mode match to complete this challenging achievement.

rewards.title: Predator
rewards.extra: Achievement points and an exclusive in-game title.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in High-Traffic Areas
tipsTricks.description: Choose hot-drop locations like Pochinki (Erangel), Bootcamp (Sanhok), or Hacienda del Patrón (Miramar) for maximum engagement opportunities.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage Early
tipsTricks.description: Try to secure a weapon quickly after landing and engage nearby players to accumulate kills early in the match.

tipsTricks.heading: Carry an Effective Loadout
tipsTricks.description: Use versatile weapons like an M416 for medium to long-range and a Micro Uzi or shotgun for close-range combat.

tipsTricks.heading: Utilize Bots to Your Advantage
tipsTricks.description: In lower-ranked lobbies, bots can help pad your kill count. Be vigilant to identify and eliminate them quickly.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Solo Mode
tipsTricks.description: Playing solo allows you to avoid sharing kills with teammates, increasing your chances of reaching the 20-kill goal.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay in High-Traffic Zones
tipsTricks.description: Position yourself near areas with frequent player movement, such as bridges, supply drops, or the center of the safe zone.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Vehicles Strategically
tipsTricks.description: Vehicles can help you quickly move between engagements and chase down fleeing enemies.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 20 Enemies in a Single Match
requirements.description: Secure at least 20 eliminations in a single Classic Mode match to complete the Predator V mission.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: Ensure you are playing in Classic Mode as eliminations in other modes will not count towards this mission.

name: Predator  IV
description: Eliminate 15 enemies in a single Classic Mode match to achieve the Predator  IV milestone.

rewards.title: Predator  IV
rewards.extra: Achievement points and a recognition badge.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Busy Areas
tipsTricks.description: Drop at high-action locations like Pochinki, School, or Military Base (Erangel) to engage with more players early on.

tipsTricks.heading: Prioritize Fast Looting
tipsTricks.description: Quickly gather weapons, armor, and health items to prepare for immediate combat after landing.

tipsTricks.heading: Carry a Versatile Loadout
tipsTricks.description: Opt for a balanced weapon combination like an M416 or AKM for mid to long-range and a Micro Uzi or shotgun for close quarters.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Mobile
tipsTricks.description: Use vehicles to move between engagements and cover large areas of the map to find more enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage Bots When Possible
tipsTricks.description: In lower-tier matches, take advantage of bots to increase your kill count.

tipsTricks.heading: Dominate Mid-Game
tipsTricks.description: Focus on holding high-traffic areas during the mid-game phase to increase chances of encountering other players.

tipsTricks.heading: Control the Final Circles
tipsTricks.description: Position yourself strategically in the final zones to maximize your eliminations before the match ends.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 15 Enemies in One Match
requirements.description: Achieve at least 15 eliminations in a single Classic Mode match to complete this mission.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: Ensure you are playing Classic Mode as eliminations in other modes do not count.

name: Predator III
description: Eliminate 10 enemies in a single Classic Mode match to complete the Predator III mission.

rewards.title: Predator III
rewards.extra: Achievement points and a progression badge.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Moderate-Traffic Areas
tipsTricks.description: Choose locations like Rozhok (Erangel), Paradise Resort (Sanhok), or Pecado (Miramar) to encounter a manageable number of enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Aggressive
tipsTricks.description: Engage actively and pursue enemies, focusing on clearing nearby areas to secure your eliminations early.

tipsTricks.heading: Maintain Ammo and Healing Items
tipsTricks.description: Carry enough ammo and healing supplies to ensure sustained combat during the match.

tipsTricks.heading: Use a Reliable Loadout
tipsTricks.description: Combine weapons like an M416 or Scar-L for mid-range and a close-combat weapon such as a Micro Uzi or shotgun.

tipsTricks.heading: Monitor the Map
tipsTricks.description: Pay attention to sound cues and the minimap to track enemy locations effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Control Mid-Game Engagements
tipsTricks.description: Focus on controlling key buildings or ridges during the mid-game phase to encounter more enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Optimize Final Circles
tipsTricks.description: Position yourself strategically in the safe zone and take advantage of players rotating into the circle.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies in One Match
requirements.description: Achieve at least 10 eliminations in a single Classic Mode match to complete this mission.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: Ensure you are playing Classic Mode as eliminations in other modes will not count.

name: Predator II
description: Eliminate 5 enemies in a single Classic Mode match to complete the Predator II mission.

rewards.title: Predator II
rewards.extra: Achievement points and a recognition badge.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Semi-Populated Areas
tipsTricks.description: Drop in areas like Georgopol Containers, Bootcamp (Sanhok), or Hacienda (Miramar) to find a mix of bots and players.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage Early
tipsTricks.description: Take advantage of the initial landing phase to secure eliminations while players are still looting.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Common Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Pick up versatile and easily accessible weapons such as AKM, M416, or UMP45 to engage enemies effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Alert
tipsTricks.description: Keep an eye on the minimap and listen for footsteps or gunfire to locate enemies nearby.

tipsTricks.heading: Be Ready for Close-Combat Fights
tipsTricks.description: Carry a shotgun or SMG for quick eliminations in close-range situations.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Bots to Your Advantage
tipsTricks.description: Lower-tier matches often include bots. Eliminate them for easy kills to meet the mission goal.

tipsTricks.heading: Position Smartly
tipsTricks.description: Hold strong positions like rooftops or ridges to spot and eliminate enemies easily.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 5 Enemies in One Match
requirements.description: Achieve at least 5 eliminations in a single Classic Mode match to complete this mission.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: Ensure you are playing Classic Mode as eliminations in other modes will not count.

name: Predator I
description: Eliminate 3 enemies in a single Classic Mode match to complete the Predator I mission.

rewards.title: Predator I
rewards.extra: Achievement points and progression rewards.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Low-Traffic Areas
tipsTricks.description: Choose quiet landing spots like small compounds or outer areas to loot and prepare for combat.

tipsTricks.heading: Prioritize Early Engagements
tipsTricks.description: Engage nearby enemies during the initial phase to secure quick eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Effective Loadouts
tipsTricks.description: Stick to beginner-friendly weapons like M416, UMP45, or AKM for reliable damage output.

tipsTricks.heading: Take Advantage of Bots
tipsTricks.description: Eliminate bots in lower-tier matches to easily meet the elimination requirement.

tipsTricks.heading: Monitor Sound Cues
tipsTricks.description: Use headphones to track gunfire and footsteps, making it easier to locate enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Aggressive but Safe
tipsTricks.description: Engage enemies cautiously, avoiding overly risky situations that could lead to elimination.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 3 Enemies in One Match
requirements.description: Achieve at least 3 eliminations in a single Classic Mode match to complete this mission.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: Ensure you are playing Classic Mode as eliminations in other modes will not count.

name: Field Medic V
description: Rescue teammates 500 times in Classic Mode matches to complete the Field Medic V mission.

rewards.title: Field Medic
rewards.extra: Achievement points and recognition for assisting your team.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Close to Your Team
tipsTricks.description: To rescue teammates, stay near them and keep an eye on your teammates' health. The quicker you respond, the higher the chances of saving them.

tipsTricks.heading: Be Prepared with Medkits and Bandages
tipsTricks.description: Always carry extra medkits, bandages, and other healing items to assist teammates when they're down.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Communication to Coordinate Rescues
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you are using voice or text chat to communicate with teammates. They can ping their location for you to rush over and revive them.

tipsTricks.heading: Rescue in Safe Zones
tipsTricks.description: Attempt rescues when you're in the safety of a secure zone to reduce the risks from external gunfire or the blue zone.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in Team Strategies
tipsTricks.description: Plan ahead with your squad to focus on healing and rescuing each other during combat engagements.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Smoke Grenades
tipsTricks.description: Throwing a smoke grenade around downed teammates can provide cover, making rescues easier and safer.

tipsTricks.heading: Rescue During Calm Moments
tipsTricks.description: During moments of calm in the match, focus on healing your teammates to ensure you're ready for future battles.

requirements.heading: Rescue 500 Teammates
requirements.description: Complete the mission by rescuing your teammates 500 times. Every match counts, and your teamwork is key!

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: Ensure you are playing Classic Mode as rescues in other modes do not count towards this mission.

name: Field Medic IV
description: Rescue teammates 100 times in Classic Mode matches to complete the Field Medic IV mission.

rewards.title: Field Medic IV
rewards.extra: Achievement points and recognition for being a key member of your squad.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Close and Alert
tipsTricks.description: Constantly keep an eye on your teammates' health and listen for distress signals to be ready for rescues.

tipsTricks.heading: Carry Extra Healing Items
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you always have plenty of healing items like medkits and bandages in your inventory for fast rescue operations.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Voice or Text Chat
tipsTricks.description: Communicate with your teammates to know their locations when they're down, which helps you reach them faster and more effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Look for Cover During Rescues
tipsTricks.description: When rescuing teammates, always look for nearby cover to avoid being shot while reviving them.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Smoke for Protection
tipsTricks.description: Deploy smoke grenades around downed teammates to provide cover and reduce the risk of enemy fire while you revive them.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in Team Combat
tipsTricks.description: Fight together as a team, helping each other out. Focus on picking up teammates as soon as it's safe.

requirements.heading: Rescue 100 Teammates
requirements.description: To complete the mission, rescue 100 teammates. Every rescue counts, so make sure to be an active contributor to your team's survival.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: This mission is only available in Classic Mode. Make sure to play Classic Mode to track your progress.

name: Field Medic III
description: Rescue teammates 30 times in Classic Mode matches to complete the Field Medic III mission.

rewards.title: Field Medic III
rewards.extra: Achievement points and recognition for being a reliable rescuer in your squad.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Near Teammates
tipsTricks.description: Always be close to your teammates and keep an eye on their health. The quicker you respond, the easier it is to save them.

tipsTricks.heading: Carry Healing Items
tipsTricks.description: Keep an abundance of medkits, bandages, and other healing items in your inventory so you are always prepared for a rescue.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Communication Effectively
tipsTricks.description: Use voice or text chat to coordinate with your teammates. Knowing their location makes rescues faster and more efficient.

tipsTricks.heading: Be Ready for Safe Rescues
tipsTricks.description: Try to revive teammates when you're in a safe position, or when the enemy is distracted or eliminated.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Smoke Grenades for Cover
tipsTricks.description: Throwing a smoke grenade around your downed teammates can provide cover, allowing you to revive them without exposing yourself to enemy fire.

tipsTricks.heading: Rescue Teammates in Calm Moments
tipsTricks.description: During quiet moments in the game, focus on rescuing your teammates to ensure they are ready for any upcoming battles.

requirements.heading: Rescue 30 Teammates
requirements.description: Complete the mission by rescuing 30 teammates. Keep track of your rescues and continue assisting your squad.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: This mission only counts rescues in Classic Mode, so make sure to play Classic Mode matches to earn progress.

name: Field Medic II
description: Rescue teammates 10 times in Classic Mode matches to complete the Field Medic II mission.

rewards.title: Field Medic II
rewards.extra: Achievement points for being a helpful teammate and rescuer.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Close to Teammates
tipsTricks.description: Being close to your teammates increases the chances of rescuing them when they go down. Keep track of their health status during the match.

tipsTricks.heading: Always Carry Healing Supplies
tipsTricks.description: Always have medkits, bandages, and first aid kits in your inventory to rescue teammates efficiently when needed.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Smoke Grenades for Protection
tipsTricks.description: Using smoke grenades when rescuing teammates can provide cover, protecting both you and your teammate from enemy attacks during the revive process.

tipsTricks.heading: Rescue During Lulls in Combat
tipsTricks.description: Rescue your teammates during breaks in enemy fire or when the combat slows down, ensuring the process is safe and fast.

requirements.heading: Rescue 10 Teammates
requirements.description: The mission is completed once you have rescued a total of 10 teammates in Classic Mode matches.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: This mission only counts rescues in Classic Mode. Make sure you play Classic Mode to make progress.

name: Field Medic I
description: Rescue 5 teammates in Classic Mode matches to complete the Field Medic I mission.

rewards.title: Field Medic I
rewards.extra: Earn achievement points for rescuing teammates in critical moments.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Close to Your Team
tipsTricks.description: Being near your teammates during the match increases the chances of rescuing them when they get knocked out.

tipsTricks.heading: Always Carry Medkits and Bandages
tipsTricks.description: Make sure you always have medkits, bandages, and first aid kits to perform rescues.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Smoke Grenades for Protection
tipsTricks.description: Deploy smoke grenades to cover your revives and avoid enemy detection while rescuing your teammate.

tipsTricks.heading: Wait for Safe Opportunities
tipsTricks.description: Only attempt a rescue when it is safe, either during lulls in combat or when enemies are distracted.

requirements.heading: Rescue 5 Teammates
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to rescue 5 teammates in Classic Mode.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: The mission is specifically designed for Classic Mode. Ensure you're playing that mode to make progress.

name: Skull Collector V
description: Eliminate 200 enemies with headshots in Classic Mode to complete the Skull Collector V mission.

rewards.title: Skull Collector V
rewards.extra: Earn achievement points for eliminating enemies with perfect headshots.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head
tipsTricks.description: Always aim for the head when engaging enemies. Use weapons with high accuracy like the M416, AKM, or Mini 14.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Scope Attachments
tipsTricks.description: Scopes like the 3x, 4x, or 6x can help with precision aiming, allowing you to more consistently hit headshots.

tipsTricks.heading: Practice in Training Mode
tipsTricks.description: Spend time in Training Mode to get used to the recoil and headshot mechanics of different weapons.

tipsTricks.heading: Choose Sniper Rifles for Long-Range Headshots
tipsTricks.description: Sniper rifles like the Kar98k, M24, or AWM are ideal for long-range headshots, so focus on using them for greater precision.

tipsTricks.heading: Keep Moving and Take Your Shots Carefully
tipsTricks.description: Take your time and ensure your aim is steady before shooting. Avoid rushing headshots unless necessary, as accuracy is key.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 200 Enemies with Headshots
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you must eliminate 200 enemies with headshots in Classic Mode.

requirements.heading: Play Classic Mode
requirements.description: This mission is exclusive to Classic Mode, so ensure you're playing that mode for progress.

name: Skull Collector IV
description: Eliminate 30 enemies with headshots in Classic Mode to complete the Skull Collector IV mission.

rewards.title: Skull Collector IV
rewards.extra: Earn achievement points for eliminating enemies with perfect headshots.

tipsTricks.description: Always focus on headshots for quick eliminations. Use weapons like M416, AKM, or Mini 14 for accuracy.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Scope Attachments
tipsTricks.description: Opt for 3x or 4x scopes to enhance your aim for headshots, especially at medium ranges.

tipsTricks.heading: Practice in Training Mode
tipsTricks.description: Training Mode can help you improve your accuracy and recoil control, which is crucial for landing headshots.

tipsTricks.heading: Sniper Rifles for Long-Range Headshots
tipsTricks.description: Use sniper rifles like Kar98k or M24 for long-range headshots. They're highly effective when aimed carefully.

tipsTricks.heading: Keep a Safe Distance
tipsTricks.description: Engage enemies at mid to long-range where you can control your shots better and have more time to aim for the head.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 30 Enemies with Headshots
requirements.description: To complete this mission, you need to eliminate 30 enemies with headshots in Classic Mode.

tipsTricks.description: Weapons like M416 and Scar-L are ideal for mid-range combat, offering both accuracy and damage for headshots.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Attachments for Stability
tipsTricks.description: Use attachments like grips and scopes to stabilize your weapon, making headshots more accurate and easier to achieve.

tipsTricks.heading: Practice in Training Mode
tipsTricks.description: Spend time in Training Mode to practice your aim, especially for landing consistent headshots on moving targets.

rewards.extra: Earn achievement points for eliminating enemies with headshots.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Medium-Range Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Weapons like M416 and Scar-L are ideal for mid-range combat, offering both accuracy and damage for headshots.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Attachments for Stability
tipsTricks.description: Use attachments like grips and scopes to stabilize your weapon, making headshots more accurate and easier to achieve.

tipsTricks.description: Spend time in Training Mode to practice your aim, especially for landing consistent headshots on moving targets.

name: Skull Collector I
description: Eliminate 1 enemy with a headshot in Classic Mode to complete the Skull Collector I mission.

rewards.title: Skull Collector I
rewards.extra: Earn achievement points for getting your first headshot elimination.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head
tipsTricks.description: Concentrate on your aim and target the head. It's the fastest way to eliminate an enemy.

tipsTricks.heading: Use a Scoped Weapon
tipsTricks.description: Using a weapon with a scope (like an M416 with a Red Dot or 4x scope) will make headshots easier.

tipsTricks.heading: Take Advantage of Standstill Moments
tipsTricks.description: When enemies are standing still or focused on something else, aim for the head to make your shot count.

name: Deathbringer V
description: Eliminate 2000 enemies in Classic Mode to complete the Deathbringer V mission.

rewards.title: Deathbringer V
rewards.extra: Earn a massive reward for eliminating 2000 enemies.

tipsTricks.description: To achieve this, you need to play regularly. Focus on getting eliminations in each match.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Aggressive
tipsTricks.description: Playing aggressively will increase your chances of encountering and eliminating enemies quickly.

tipsTricks.heading: Team Up with Friends
tipsTricks.description: Playing with a coordinated team can help you secure more eliminations and increase your chances of surviving.

tipsTricks.heading: Use High-Impact Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Weapons like Sniper Rifles, Assault Rifles, and SMGs can help you get eliminations more efficiently.

name: Deathbringer IV
description: Eliminate 800 enemies in Classic Mode to complete the Deathbringer IV mission.

rewards.title: Deathbringer IV
rewards.extra: A significant reward for eliminating 800 enemies across multiple matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on High-Activity Areas
tipsTricks.description: Areas like military bases, bootcamp, and Pochinki are more populated and can give you more opportunities for eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Aggressively but Strategically
tipsTricks.description: To get more eliminations, try to engage more enemies, but avoid rushing into situations that could get you killed too early.

tipsTricks.heading: Use High DPS Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Weapons like the AKM or UMP45 are great for consistent damage and can help secure quick eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Team Up for Better Chances
tipsTricks.description: Playing with friends increases your chances of survival, which means more time to eliminate enemies.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 800 Enemies

name: Deathbringer III
description: Eliminate 200 enemies in Classic Mode to complete the Deathbringer III mission.

rewards.title: Deathbringer III
rewards.extra: Earn this title by eliminating 200 enemies, showcasing your killing prowess.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Popular Locations
tipsTricks.description: Try landing in areas with high player traffic, such as Bootcamp or Pochinki, where you're more likely to encounter enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Take Advantage of the Late Game
tipsTricks.description: The later stages of the match usually have more action as the playzone shrinks. Stay alert to increase your eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Burst-Damage Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Weapons like the AKM or M416 are great for dealing significant damage in a short amount of time, which helps with eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Aggressively in Solo Mode
tipsTricks.description: If you’re playing solo, adopt an aggressive playstyle to maximize enemy eliminations. But be mindful of your positioning.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 200 Enemies
